channel.title: [317] Life-X PVP [PI]
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape, I'm currently working on my new PVP project. It will obviously be a highly PK based server but im also aiming towards some nice bosses to fight and skills, maybe a few minigames here and there. But this is no easy task and im needed a team.
Application Format:
(I WOULD LOVE TO SEE SOME OF YOUR WORK) Name: Coding experience: Age: How long will you be on the computer daily: Server/Client:
[b][center]Added to Server/Client already: Skillcape emotes Quest tab item spawning Fixed ALL dupes I know of Perfect PKing Duel arena ect..[/center]
Im looking to add: Full warriors guild 525 animations Full godwars Tormented Demons PVP Armours Pk points.
Pictures: [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2zq7m04.jpg[/img]

item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

Also, you should forget about 525 animations, as the 525 header isn’t fully working for 317 clients, so it will bug a lot.[/quote]Well, i cant really code… i can only host.

and thanks for informing me.
